=== Perfection Theme ===

I tried to make a perfect gtk theme. A light, elegant and beautiful theme, it's a little similar with Elementary and Mac OS X.

=== Concept ===
Prfktion is a mod of Perfection it combines murrine engine and pixmap engine so looks amazing. Now I'm working a icon-theme for this theme with black folders and monochrome icons for the panel.
Wallpaper for the theme: http://www.flickr.com/photos/50735923@N08/4660734942/

Sorry for my english, I'm from Spain :P
